channel.title: Need help with shop error!
channel.description:
I'm trying to fix my shop and it's kinda edentical to the other shops just other id's for items and i get an error here is the error:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "1000 1325 1 000 1329 1000 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at server.world.ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:147) at server.world.ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:45) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:62) Press any key to continue . . .
Here is the line: shop = 7 Weapon_shop 2 2 1323 1000 1325 1000 1329 1000 1331 1000 1333 1000 4587 1000 1215 1000 1309 1000 1313 1000 1315 1000 1317 1000 1319 1000 1305 1000 5698 1000 1434 1000 1203 1000 1207 1000 1217 1000 1209 1000 1211 1000 1213 1000 3204 1000

do someone have teamviewer we can fix it

item.title: Need help with shop error!
item.dc:creator: @Coldmedicine Coldmedicine
item.description:
@Coldmedicine wrote:

Space gives errors, use tab instead.

Read full topic

Are you sure its tabbed cause when i tried to tab it looked like this
1000 1325 1000 1329 1000
